title: Textile Fragment, late 17th–early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Green silk damask, brocaded in gold and rose; hunters, birds, winged figures, supporting an urn.

late 17th–early 18th century. Medium: silk
